file_content.text: You don't matter, worthless copy.
It doesn't matter. Nothing you do matters.
Even if I die here, you won't be real. You're just a cheap copy, Mako.
She yammers a lot for someone who's just been totally beaten, doesn't she?
Pull the trigger and let's get out of here.
Kill her, Mako.
Bye, sis.
What do you want to do with her?
It's your call, Mako.
SIS can have her. She can rot for all I care.
SIS can pick her up. Don't know about you, but I've had my fill of crazy.
Leave her for Izak.
Me, too. Let's hope it doesn't run in the family.
Hey, sis. Long time no see, huh?
Mako? What are you doing here? How did you find me?
Met some of our sisters. It was real sweet. Heartwarming, you might say.
Oh, about that--I should have warned you....
We already know you set us up.
Can it.
I didn't set you up, I swear!
Probably slipped your mind that you're a quadruplet, or whatever. Easy mistake.
I'm sure you just forgot.
It's a lot to take in... I didn't want to overwhelm you.
You got an explanation, you better spit it out quick.
Start talking.
Project 32 is trying to frame me, Mako! The others were in on it!
Help me slice this computer. If I can erase my records, I can just disappear. Nobody else will get hurt. Please!
I've got two words for you, Coral: Bantha dung.
You used me. You wanted Izak dead. You wanted the other girls dead. Quit pretending to be the victim.
Don't see this going anywhere.
No point in talking, Mako.
You're probably right.
Funny how that wasn't good enough.
Guess she needs a new story.
Oh yeah, hilarious. I might bust a gut laughing about this later.
You want to get anything else out of her, be quick about it. Izak's probably on his way.
Better talk faster, Mako.
Well, Coral, you have anything else you want to say before I watch Izak cart your sorry behind out of here?
So I set you up, so what? You don't matter. Neither did the others. None of you are even real people!
I'm real. You think I wanted to be part of a set? Would you want that?
I'm not like the rest of you: I'm unique. You're not even a person!
Mako? Is that you? How did--no, that's a stupid question.
We'll take her out of here, clean all this up.
We'll take Coral from here. I guess we should thank you.
Are you alright?
I'm great. Never better. I've only fought, and killed, my identical twin for the third time. That's not freaky at all.
I don't know what you guys are going to do to her, but I have a hunch she deserves it.
That stuff she said about being a copy... what do you think that was supposed to mean?
Targets mouth off. Just tune it out.
Nothing.
She was pretty full of bantha dung.
You letting her get to you?
That bothering you?
I don't know. I feel pretty surreal right now.
Could've meant anything. Or it could've just been more crazy.
I don't know.
Probably didn't mean anything except in her messed up head.
We're moving out. Mako, we will have to talk later.
Let's get out of here, okay? I want to be as far from this place as possible.
